statements: SELECT * FROM warranty_information WHERE part_id = 1;
SELECT part_name, warranty_duration FROM warranty_information WHERE warranty_duration > 5;
SELECT * FROM warranty_information WHERE warranty_end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT part_name, warranty_start_date FROM warranty_information WHERE warranty_start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-01-01';
SELECT service_provider FROM warranty_information WHERE part_name LIKE '%battery%';
SELECT * FROM warranty_information WHERE warranty_duration > 1 ORDER BY warranty_start_date DESC
SELECT part_id, part_name FROM warranty_information WHERE warranty_end_date > '2023-01-01' ORDER BY warranty_start_date ASC
SELECT part_id, part_name, warranty_end_date FROM warranty_information WHERE part_name LIKE 'Battery%' AND warranty_duration >= 2
SELECT * FROM warranty_information WHERE service_provider IN ('ABC Company', 'XYZ Services') AND warranty_duration < 5
SELECT part_name, warranty_end_date FROM warranty_information WHERE warranty_start_date BETWEEN '2022-06-01' AND '2023-06-01' ORDER BY part_name ASC
SELECT * FROM parts_warranty;
SELECT part_name, warranty_start_date FROM parts_warranty WHERE part_id = 1;
SELECT part_id, service_date, service_provider, service_description FROM service_records WHERE claim_status = 'Approved';
SELECT * FROM service_records ORDER BY service_date DESC;
SELECT part_id, warranty_end_date, service_provider FROM service_records INNER JOIN parts_warranty ON service_records.part_id = parts_warranty.part_id;
SELECT * FROM parts_warranty WHERE part_id = 1;
SELECT part_name, warranty_start_date FROM parts_warranty WHERE warranty_end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT part_name, warranty_start_date, warranty_end_date FROM parts_warranty WHERE warranty_end_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT part_name, service_date, service_provider FROM parts_warranty JOIN service_records ON parts_warranty.part_id = service_records.part_id;
SELECT part_name, service_provider, claim_status FROM parts_warranty JOIN service_records ON parts_warranty.part_id = service_records.part_id WHERE claim_status = 'approved';
SELECT * FROM parts;
SELECT part_name, part_id FROM parts ORDER BY part_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM services WHERE service_cost > 1000;
SELECT service_type, service_cost FROM services WHERE service_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT part_id, part_name, warranty_duration FROM parts WHERE warranty_duration < 2;
SELECT * FROM parts ORDER BY part_name DESC, part_id ASC;
SELECT part_name, serial_number FROM parts WHERE warranty_duration > 3;
SELECT service_type, service_cost FROM services WHERE service_cost BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY service_cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM parts JOIN warranty_claims ON parts.part_id = warranty_claims.part_id WHERE warranty_claims.claim_status = 'Pending';
SELECT service_type, claim_date FROM services JOIN warranty_claims ON services.service_id = warranty_claims.service_id WHERE warranty_claims.claim_status = 'Approved';
SELECT * FROM Parts;
SELECT part_name, part_description FROM Parts WHERE warranty_duration > 1;
SELECT service_name, service_cost FROM Services ORDER BY service_cost DESC;
SELECT part_name, warranty_start_date, warranty_end_date FROM Parts JOIN WarrantyInfo ON Parts.part_id = WarrantyInfo.part_id;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_description, claim_resolved FROM Claims WHERE claim_resolved = false;
SELECT * FROM Parts;
SELECT part_name, part_description FROM Parts WHERE warranty_duration > 1;
SELECT * FROM WarrantyInfo JOIN Parts ON WarrantyInfo.part_id = Parts.part_id WHERE WarrantyInfo.warranty_start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT service_name, service_cost FROM Services ORDER BY service_cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM Claims WHERE claim_resolved = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM parts;
SELECT part_name, supplier_id FROM parts WHERE part_id = 1;
SELECT part_name, supplier_id, warranty_info FROM parts WHERE part_id = 2;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_address FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT service_name, cost FROM services WHERE cost > 1000;
SELECT parts.part_name, suppliers.supplier_name FROM parts JOIN suppliers ON parts.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id
SELECT parts.part_name, warranty_claims.claim_status FROM parts LEFT JOIN warranty_claims ON parts.part_id = warranty_claims.part_id
SELECT suppliers.supplier_name, services.service_name, services.cost FROM suppliers JOIN services ON suppliers.supplier_id = services.service_id

SELECT parts.part_name, suppliers.supplier_name, warranty_compliance.compliance_status FROM parts JOIN suppliers ON parts.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id JOIN warranty_compliance ON parts.part_id = warranty_compliance.part_id

SELECT parts.part_name, services.service_name, warranty_compliance.last_checked FROM parts LEFT JOIN services ON parts.part_id = services.service_id LEFT JOIN warranty_compliance ON parts.part_id = warranty_compliance.part_id
